title: 基础插件如何设置喊话要钱？
author: caixiaojing77
txt_content:
基础插件如何设置喊话要钱？
求详细

replies.author: lichi2050
replies.txt_content:
这里是ess的经济设置，你在command costs这里添加chat-shout和chat-question就行。具体大概是这样
command-costs:
  # /example costs $1000 PER USE
  #example: 1000
  # /kit tools costs $1500 PER USE
  #kit-tools: 1500
    chat-shout: 50
    chat-question: 50 
这样就可以给全图喊话增加费用了。50只是个例子，你可以用其他的数字。

replies.author: caixiaojing77
replies.txt_content:
